name: Holy "How Might We" Workshop
description:
What is HMW?

A collaborative, fun and productive workshop to identify frustrations or pain points, rephrase them and quickly come up with solutions.


How does it work?

This workshop offers both individual and collective thinking.

  1. Identify and outline problems/challenges
  2. Rephrase them into questions starting by "How might we..."
  3. Time for ideas!


When should I conduct this workshop?

Give it a shot if your team (5â€“8 participants) has about 30 minutes to spend on design issues.


Enjoy!
